notes: Spacious, high-quality modern apartment on the 14th floor with excellent natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows and balcony access. The apartment is very clean with contemporary finishes, recessed lighting, and built-in cabinetry. Baby safety concerns include the accessible balcony with glass railings, a raised platform/tatami area with steps that could be a fall hazard, and sharp corners on the glass coffee table and wooden furniture.
